{{Wired embedded system |brand=LG |model=N2B1D |asin=B0039BPFSY;GB; |price=329 |est_release_date=10/2009 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=4.74 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=NAND01GW3B2CN6 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G1631C-FP-S6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, eSATA, |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, SATA 4-Port Multiplier;Marvell;88SM4140;;1;,,, 4 Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;NEC;μPD720114;;1;,,, 8-bit Single-Chip Microcontroller;NEC; D78F0535;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor With I2C and SMBus Interface;TI;TMP75;;1;,,, Dual 2-Phase Synchro Step-Down Controller;Linear Tech;LTC3858;;1;,,, 4.5V-5.5V, 2A Synchronous Buck Converter;Rohm;BD9111;;1;,,, 2.7V-5.5V, 2A Synchronous Buck Converter;Rohm;BD9130;;1;,,, 30V, 14.5A N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild;FDS6676AS;;2;,,, 30V, 14A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6682;;2;,,, Step-Down Switching Regulator;Rohm;BD9132MUV;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, Quad Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2044;;1; |flags=LCD display, SD/SDHC /MMC Card slot, Blu-ray drive, RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;NC1; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36.2;-lgnas; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:E0:91 }} {{TagLine|Network Attached Storage Enclosure with Blu-Ray ReWriter}} :[https://www.lg.com/uk/network-storage/lg-N2B1D-network-attached-storage Product page]{{•}}[https://www.lg.com/us/support-product/lg-N2B1DB2#softwareFirmware Support page]
:[http://gscs-b2c.lge.com/downloadFile?fileId=KROWM000265585.pdf User Guide]{{•}}[http://opensource.lge.com/images/front/ico-source-code.png GPL Firmware Source]
*Internal SATA Ports occupied by a Blu-Ray disk rewriter :and two 1TB Hitachi-LG disks.
{{See also|LG N1T1DD1|List of NAS Devices}}
